sentence: In a teaser for an ABC "Nightline " report on the next seven days of GOP primaries that could dictate the fate of both the Senate and the House of Representatives, Republicans in Georgia express dismay at the inevitability that they will be saddled with former football player Herschel Walker as their nominee for an obtainable Senate seat.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: 'It's going to be a tough day': Georgia Republicans concerned over Herschel Walker's Senate run

sentence: A notable exception: former football star Herschel Walker, whos set for a big Senate primary win Tuesday and who was recruited by Trump.
title: Trump washes hands of Perdue in Georgia as his campaign limps into final stretch

sentence: Even though polls point to a Perdue loss, Trump's endorsed candidate in the state's Senate primary, former football star Herschel Walker, remains the overwhelming favorite.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Trump Endorsement More 'Matchbox Car' Than 'Freight Train': Geoff Duncan
